question: Which of the following statements is correct? In the $IR$ spectrum of 3-methyl-2-butanone, the most intense absorption is at **(a)** $3400 \ cm^{-1}$, owing to an OH stretching mode; **(b)** $1700 \ cm^{-1}$, owing to a $\ce{C=O}$ stretching mode; **(c)** $2000 \ cm^{-1}$, owing to a $\ce{CH}$ stretching mode; **(d)** $1500 \ cm^{-1}$, owing to the rocking of an isopropyl group.
